messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello! I recently placed an order with the order number W9300146, and I would like to change the Desk Lamp in that order to the cheapest Desk Lamp you have available. Also, if there is any price difference, I would like that amount to be given to me as a gift card. Could you please help me with this? Additionally, I would like to know the total amount I will get back.

message.content: Hello! I recently placed an order with the order number W9300146, and I would like to change the Desk Lamp in that order to the cheapest Desk Lamp you have available. Also, if there is any price difference, I would like that amount to be given to me as a gift card. Could you please help me with this? Additionally, I would like to know the total amount I will get back.

messages.content:
I can help with that — first I need to confirm your identity. Please provide either:

- the email on the account, or
- your first name, last name, and zip code.

Once I locate your user id and confirm that the order #W9300146 belongs to you, I will check the order status and then list the exact modification details (current Desk Lamp item id, the cheapest Desk Lamp item id available, and the price difference). I will then ask you to confirm (yes) before I make the change and issue the gift card refund for any price difference.
